Package com.alexkasko.unsafe

Class Summary
ByteArrayTool Front-end class for operations over byte arrays.
LongPacker Contains static methods for packing two values with limited size (one long and one int) into one long value.
OffHeapLongArray Implementation of array of long using OffHeapMemory.
OffHeapMemory Allocates an area of off-heap memory that is not a subject to GC.
OffHeapSorter alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapLongArray.
